text: Yevgeni Vladimirovich Yezhov (; born 11 February 1995) is a Russian football defender. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Russian Professional Football League for FC Spartak-2 Moscow on 25 May 2014 in a game against FC Oryol. He made his Russian Football Premier League debut on 21 March 2015 for FC Arsenal Tula in a game against PFC CSKA Moscow. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:People from Zhukovsky District, Bryansk Oblast Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Arsenal Tula players Category:FC Torpedo Moscow players Category:FC Spartak Moscow players Category:FC Khimik-Arsenal players
title: Yevgeni Yezhov
